HYDROMATIC Site.

"Comprehensive Monitoring Solution for Kratky Hydroponics Farms. Leveraging IoT, our system integrates water-level sensors, water temperature sensors, and air pumps to optimize and sustain your hydroponic system."

Key Features

Water-Level Monitoring

Track the water levels in real-time to ensure optimal conditions for your plants.

Temperature Monitoring

Monitor the water temperature to maintain the perfect environment for your crops.

Automated Air Pumps

Ensure efficient aeration with automated air pumps that supply oxygen to the roots of the plants.

HydroMatic Device

Description: We develop a device that utilizes sensors to monitor and supply oxygen in hydroponic setup. It ensures optimal growing conditions and facitlitates oxygen delivery to aerate water for growth efficiency.

1. Water Level Sensor
Description: A device that measures the level of water in a container, providing real-time data for applications.
2. DS18B20 Temperature Sensor
Description: A digital temperature sensor capable of measuring temperatures ranging from -55°C to +125°C.
3. Air Pump
Description: An electric or manual device that moves air from one location to another, typically used to aerate water in hydroponic system, ensuring oxygen for plant roots.
4.ESP8266 NodeMCU v1.0 (ESP-12E)
Description: A low-cost Wi-Fi microchip with full TCP/IP stack and microcontroller capabilities, often used in IoT projects for wireless connectivity and control of devices.
5. NodeMCU Baseboard
Description: A development board designed for the ESP8266, providing easy access to GPIO pins, power supply, and programming interfaces, facilitating rapid prototyping of IoT applications.
6.Relay Module
Description: An electronic component that allows a low-power signal to control a high-power circuit, it is used to control the Air Pump.

Steps to Use HydroMatic Device

  1. 1. Go to the WiFi settings and connect to the "ESP8266_Config" network.
  2. 2. Type 192.168.4.1 on your browser and input the username and password at the back of device.
  3. 3. Input the bed number "bed_", also type the ssid/name and password of the WiFi network.
  4. 4. Wait for the SUCCESS message to display and connect to your network to see the Dashboard.

About Us

We are a passionate team dedicated to innovating and revolutionizing the hydroponic industry.

Our Mission

At HydroMatic, our mission is to make sustainable farming accessible to everyone through cutting-edge technology. We aim to empower farmers, hobbyists, and businesses with the tools they need to grow plants efficiently and sustainably.

Our team of experts brings together a wealth of experience in agriculture, engineering, and technology to deliver innovative hydroponic solutions. We believe in the power of hydroponics to transform the future of farming and are committed to making this vision a reality.
